Summary: Biochemical reaction from desmethyl rabeprazole to desmethyl rabeprazole thioether. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2D6.
Biochemical reaction from rabeprazole to rabeprazole sulfone. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from rabeprazole thioether to desmethyl rabeprazole thioether. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2C19.
Biochemical reaction from rabeprazole to desmethyl rabeprazole. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2C19.
Biochemical reaction from rabeprazole to rabeprazole thioether.
Biochemical reaction from rabeprazole thioether to rabeprazole. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP3A4.
